name: Nora Ney
description: '''Nora Ney''' (born '''Iracema de Sousa Ferreira''', [[Rio de Janeiro]], March 20, 1922 – Rio de Janeiro, October 2003) was a Brazilian singer. She is also the most notable{{according to whom?|date=February 2024}} singer of the [[samba-canção]] music style and a pioneer{{according to whom?|date=February 2024}} of the [[Brazilian rock]].
